author: jacek.glen
content:
Ahead of our meeting on Monday, I've added some thoughts and analysis on the effects of EIP-7904 (General Repricing): https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-7904-gas-cost-repricing-to-reflect-computational-complexity/23067/4
Please have a read and let me know your thoughts

author: bridge-bot
content: <gakonst> Haven't been able to engage with this group yet but wanted to share I am deeply appreciative of this workstream and Reth wants to support this / go ham
